tv.generator-info-name: Original XML Generated with Tempest EPG Generator (made by Kvanc) - Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v0.9

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Australias longest running music TV show, rage is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres and eras. We curate the best clips of all time to surprise and entertain you for hours.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Jerry tours a thriving succulent garden, Costa revives a derelict pond, Sophie gives a masterclass on hanging baskets, Clarence helps save rainforest seeds, and we meet a plantswoman with a flair for naturalistic design.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Joe OBrien.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: A special episode of The Pacific celebrating the 50th anniversary of PNGs independence. Join us as we reflect on 50 years of nationhood - the successes, and the challenges - plus what comes next for PNG in the years ahead.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: A former Olympic snowboarder and her builder husband take on a mountainous challenge when they decide to build a unique shed-like home on a remote ridge in Victorias Strath Creek.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: News from where we live. ABC News NSW brings you the days top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Nakari Thorpe, plus sport with Chloe Hart.

programme.title: Professor T
programme.desc: When an attempt is made on a billionaire businessmans life, Professor T suspects the culprit may be much closer to home than the police suspect. Its Professor Ts birthday and with it comes a haunting childhood memory.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the days events, explaining whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: A secret from his father propels Jack to Belfast. Meanwhile, Simone and Nikki investigate the mystery of a burned body. As familial secrets come to the surface, Jack faces tragedy head on.

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going every Saturday morning with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the rage vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Professor T
programme.desc: When an attempt is made on a billionaire businessmans life, Professor T suspects the culprit may be much closer to home than the police suspect. Its Professor Ts birthday and with it comes a haunting childhood memory.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Lisa Millar is on an odyssey to discover Australias largest inland waterway, the magnificent Gippsland Lakes in Victoria. It is home to over 300 native wildlife species, including the rare and endangered Burrunan dolphin.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: Panic spreads when an arsonist targets three businesses, invoking the childrens story of the Three Little Pigs. Personal feeling clouds Humphreys judgment when he starts to believe Archie could be their culprit.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: Just like Zelda and Minecraft Dungeons, Harry and Gem embark on an epic quest to find Harrys missing sock! Theyll have to pick their class, level up, and adventure across distant lands to defeat the evil dragon Drakthor!

programme.title: rage Vroom Vroom Special
programme.desc: From Jamiroquai, Gorillaz, M.I.A, David Hasselhoff and more, come jump in the rage automobile and jam out to the best music videos that feature the coolest whips around.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: The Bears find a bedazzled jean jacket in a dumpster. Its just about the coolest thing theyve ever seen and seems to make the wearer extremely lucky. But after the Bears fight over who gets control of the jacket.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: A figure skating trainer named Philippe gets akumatized into Frozer. Armed with evil ice skates, he wants to turn Paris into a Kingdom of Ice. Ladybug and Cat Noir cant get cold feet if they want to stop him!

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Copy Cat
programme.desc: Ava is selected to deliver a speech at the town hall, but when she is accused of stealing it, Maudie must prove her innocence.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Gotta Go Fast, The Sonic Special!
programme.desc: Gems joined by Sonic expert Bajo for a super speedy Sonic episode! Plus, SG sings about Sonics greatest superpower, another date goes astray in Finding Player 2 and Gem and Harry get a surprise in The New Coach!

programme.title: BTN Newsbreak
programme.desc: Find out whats going on in the world with a news bulletin designed for children, featuring stories that are relevant and easy to understand.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The grand final begins with the biggest battle in Robot Wars history. Then two group battles followed by the knockout rounds in order to determine the two robots that will fight it out to decide who is Robot Wars Champion.

programme.title: Officially Amazing
programme.desc: Breath-taking basketball dunks, moving peas with a straw, and a mass boomerang throw are amongst the records being attempted.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: How Dare You Do That To My Bulma! Vegetas Metamorphosis Of Fury!
programme.desc: When even Buu cant land a hit on Beerus, Vegeta steps in to calm the angry God. The other Z fighters step in, but Beerus proves to be a challenge unlike any other. When he threatens Bulma, will Vegeta finally make his move?

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: Harry, Gem, and Screen Goblin have a Pokemon play date but theres one problem: Gem has organised a hang out with old GGSP host Will instead! Could this mean the end of the gang?

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: When one of Shadow Moths favourite victims is akumatized into Penalteam, a fearsome team of supervillains, Ladybug calls on her own superheroes to face her. May the best team win!

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Rosemary Riddle
programme.desc: Ezra is grumpy when his visiting Nanna interrupts his detective work until she unexpectedly gives the Inbestigators a case to crack.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Teenage Boss: Next Level
programme.desc: Labelled a tough boss by her mum, Arrayah is saving to see her pop idol but she doesnt factor in that some old habits die hard and families can be difficult to control.

programme.title: Speechless
programme.desc: Maya has jury duty, which is like a vacation for her until she learns Taylors mum is also there. JJ lies about his disabilities on an online dating site, while Ray is upset that Jimmy and Dylan spend too much time together.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!: Do Try This At Home
programme.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand get to grips with the heart and show how to build a pumping heart model in todays DO try this at home experiment.

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: Some of the best loved stand-ups and a raft of the next generation of comedians, featuring Rhys James, Esther Manito, Travis Jay, Russell Kane, Sikisa, Josh Jones, Finlay Christie and Josh Weller.

programme.title: Silverpoint
programme.desc: Bea must deal with the past and her family head on, while Louis asks the Artefact for help and finally gets an answer to the mystery that brought him to the camp.Â

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.sub-title: Heart Hunter (the Battle Of The Miraculous Pt1)
programme.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face the Bourgeois couple. Now Hearthunter, a Cerberus with two heads, they devour all the love in Paris.

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Exciting Excursion
programme.desc: The Grade Five rock climbing excursion is jeopardised when the permission slips go missing, but Maudie suspects they may have been hidden on purpose.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
programme.sub-title: The Gift Of The Maud Pie
programme.desc: While in Manehattan looking for the ideal location for her new store, Rarity has to help Pinkie Pie find the perfect gift for her sister, Maud - without Maud finding out.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Arrrr! R loves being a pirate, so she rustles up a ship and takes her crew on a ride. This episode introduces the letter R and the words rug, rod, rag, dig and red.

programme.title: Lets Sing!
programme.desc: Introduce a new generation of students to an old classic! Join Kanen Breen and sing along to Purple People Eater.

programme.title: Learn Mandarin
programme.desc: Harper wants to join in and play hide and seek with her cousin Guozi, but theres a big problem - she doesnt know what all the numbers are in Mandarin.

programme.title: BTN Newsbreak
programme.desc: Find out whats going on in the world with a news bulletin designed for children, featuring stories that are relevant and easy to understand.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: In Harrogate, Phil meets Andrew and Jenna, whose three-bed in the exclusive Duchy area should have flown off the shelf. But on closer inspection he finds some serious problems lurking.

programme.title: George Clarkes Old House New Home
programme.desc: In Manchester, George meets a family with a Victorian Coach house thats more 1960s than 1860s. Plus George helps a couple with their 16th century gate house with a kitchen-diner that resembles a tudor banqueting hall.

programme.title: A Perfect Murder
programme.desc: A wealthy woman becomes the target for murder when her husband, an investor with financial difficulties, discovers her affair with an artist and blackmails her lover into killing her.

programme.title: rage Vault Guest Programmer: Basement Jaxx
programme.desc: Wheres Your Head At if youre not kicking off your weekend with Basement Jaxxs 2002 rage guest program, featuring music videos from Jimi Hendrix, The Police, Soul II Soul and more.

programme.title: Unforgotten
programme.desc: The victims turbulent past comes to light and leads the team in unexpected directions. While Sunny takes a trip to Paris and Jess drops in on an unsuspecting Lord, the pair continue to butt heads.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Silverpoint
programme.desc: Fisher has taken control of the Artefact. With no time to lose, Meg needs Finn, Alice and Elliot to join her on a mission to save her friends.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.sub-title: Miracle Queen (the Battle Of The Miraculous Pt2)
programme.desc: Hawk Moth akumatizes Chloe into Miracle Queen to put a fatal plan into action. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir escape it?

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: Amid a bot uprising the Novas defeat a hijacker, but disaster strikes for their Stardustian friend.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic: The Crystal Empire
programme.desc: Synopsis

programme.title: Chopsticks Or Fork?
programme.desc: You dont need to be Chinese to run a successful Chinese restaurant, as proven by the Chiems, a Vietnamese family at Gawler Palace Chinese Restaurant in South Australia where their honey chicken reigns supreme.

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: With Janey away at university, Susan is depressed to find she is now the only woman in the Harper house. Much to her husbands consternation, she eyes Bens cousins daughter Abi as the ideal solution to Janeys empty room.

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.sub-title: Fire Extinguisher, Nail Gun, Shotgun Chandelier
programme.desc: Jon and Brian take on Hollywoods invisible assassins and a trio of tall tales of ingenious makeshift booby traps.

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: Some of the best loved stand-ups and a raft of the next generation of comedians, featuring Russell Kane, Rhys James, Sharon Wanjohi, Tom Ward, Adam Flood, Micky Overman and Travis Jay.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: Travelling in the Pinky Ponk, the Tombliboos are drinking their Pinky Ponk juice.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: Mole goes to find the Sound Collector, and soon finds herself playing hide and squeak.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing is busy building a tower as tall as he is with his blocks and is upset when Coco arrives and hijacks the blocks so that she can make a rainbow pattern with them instead.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig gets a new movie camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa saying hello. Everyone laughs when they see Peppa on TV. Peppa, George and Mummy make a movie just for Daddy.

programme.title: PJ Masks Power Heroes
programme.desc: Octobellas moat get gloopes with suprising and unpleasant consequences.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly and Ben help the Wise Old Elf play a trick on Nanny Plum for Elf Joke Day, but she does not see the funny side and gets her revenge by turning the Wise Old Elf into a giant snail.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are at a Jigsaw festival with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Old Mrs Donkey explains how important it is not to lose a jigsaw piece but then Peppa spots one on the floor! Thankfully, Peppa finds its home.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Kangaroo Beach legend, King Kanga, is back and ready to rule the beach. But the cadets soon learn that he has a very different lifeguardingapproach.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: Katyas tumble off her broom makes her vow to never fly again, but with her friends support, she learns that mistakes are part of learning and regains her confidence.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley cleans Cynthias bus making lots of bubbles, so many they spread all around town.

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie, Nina and Akil are dressing up for fun. Eddie imagines and creates a costume with the help of his friends.

programme.title: Play School Show Time
programme.sub-title: Sharron Mirii Bell: Let Us Pay Respects And Stomp
programme.desc: Join proud Wiradjuri Gamilaraay woman Sharron mirii Bell for a stomp as we learn the words and actions to her own songs - Let Us Pay Respects and Stomp.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Talk about your favourite colours with The Wiggles, and then, oh no! Anthony and Lucia have accidentally turned everyones skivvies blue in the wash! Luckily, Lachy is here to help.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: G is growing wishes but U doesnt believe in them, until something very big happens. This episode has fun with UG and the words jug, rug, tug and bug.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.sub-title: Mr Potatos Fruit And Vegetable Quiz
programme.desc: Mr Potato visits the school to sing the vegetable song and tell the children about the importance of eating five fruits or vegetables a day. But which team will win his quiz?

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: The volcano is active which means the baby Pea-Rexes get to play Pea Shooter. Ginger manages to find her own way to join in.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Pippen loses her voice before her concert. Can Vida help her get it back in time for her solo?

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Myrtle needs to go away and declares Stanley Mayor for the day. Benjamin and Sophie help and show him how to cut the ribbon when opening Pearls dance class.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: When an experiment goes wrong, Romeo tries to turn it to his advantage.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Kangaroo Beach legend, King Kanga, is back and ready to rule the beach. But the cadets soon learn that he has a very different lifeguardingapproach.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Ruths new car, Cleo, takes to the rails to race Thomas, she soon discovers why she is designed to stick to the roads.

programme.title: Reef School
programme.desc: The Reefies team up in pairs to compete in the ocean-famous piggyback race. When a surprise competitor joins the race, the results turn unexpectedly fishy!

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Join The Wiggles as they sing about their favourite dolls and enjoy a special song about Lucias cherished doll Curly Sue. Count, sing and dance along as The Wiggles explore the joy of friendship and dolls.

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: When Marwyn runs out of ice, the Martians send a giant hunk of ice. The Mechas have to stop the ice from sliding into a skyscraper!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey asks Dad to help her draw a dragon for her story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Today at playgroup Peppa and her friends make their own instruments from bits and bobs of old packaging.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Felix causes chaos as a giant pig, but Mojo and Bo are right on his huge, curly tail!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts and Paani are on high alert for hurricane season. Dashi flies the Octoray through the eye of a storm, just in time to warn everyone that the hurricane is headed straight for the Florida Everglades!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Coco wants to play Wild Girls with Indy, but Chloe wants her to play another game.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee blows up some balloons for Tino the artistic mouses birthday, but the squirrels are worried because Tino can be grumpy.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea plunges Broccoli and Carrot into the doughnut toppings simultaneously, and Supertato almost quits being a superhero when he cant save his two friends at the same time.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Indy and Rusty play Mums and Dads, they cant agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: Everything in the garden is so noisy that Igglepiggle moves away to find a quiet place to be by himself.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collector gets lost in the fog, and has to use sound to get him home.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula go to the park to feed the ducks. Sula is very good at standing quietly and giving the ducks just the right amount of food.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppas playgroup is putting on a play. Peppa is going to be Little Red Riding Hood. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig help her to practice her lines. On the night of the play, Peppa and her friends act out the story beautifully.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Unable to pay the elves, King Thistle has to go to work to earn a coin.

programme.title: Ariel
programme.sub-title: The Cuttlebaby Sitter / Flounder the Leader
programme.desc: Ariel babysits adorable cuttlebabies. Flounder is chosen as the team coach.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.sub-title: Long Among the Pines / A Mermaid in Pitchfork Pines
programme.desc: Frankie and Zoe learn safety in the forest with Ranger Ben, while Drac and his Monster Pets help Melusine, a mermaid, learn to fly in this exciting and fun-filled adventure!

programme.title: Fizzy And Suds
programme.desc: Fizzy and Suds visit an observatory to explore our planets! They see how planets orbit the Sun, what theyre made of, and theres a special trip to Mars!

programme.title: Wilfrid Gordon Mcdonald Partridge
programme.desc: When 6-year-old Wilfrid discovers his 96-year-old best friend Nancy has lost her memory, he embarks on a heartwarming quest to help her remember. Based on the classic childrens book by Mem Fox.

programme.title: Mixmups
programme.desc: When Yapette is poorly and loses her woof, can the Mixmups find a way to make her woofy and waggy again.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.sub-title: Dance With The Tree Of Wisdom
programme.desc: Lets dance with The Tree of Wisdom, shake our arms, Wiggle like no ones watching, and learn some new moves along the way!

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Three paints Two with one too many blocks and realises disguises wont help.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George join Granny Pig and her friends to play at being Vikings. The Vikings are having fun on Grandpa Pigs boat until they realise theyve left their picnic behind!

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Lu learns to commit to a decision

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Bobby and Tish are outside in the garden having a picnic, they each have one cookie left each. Tish gobbles hers up like a cookie eating monster but before Bobby can eat his, an ant steals it away!

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Tidbit swallows a watermelon seed and worries hes going to grow a watermelon in his tummy.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: There is thick snow all over town, Myrtle and Joses delivery van are snowed in so Myrtle asks Stanley to get some shopping for her.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: When Orticia send Gekkos pumpkins bad, Gekko is desperate to stop them.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: When the cadets are put in charge of running the lifeguard club all by themselves, it proves to be the toughest - and most rewarding - day of their lives.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas is asked to help at the animal park for the day and realises theres more to the job than he first thought.

programme.title: Peppa Pig: Caravan
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are on a caravan adventure but they dont know where to go!

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: When Wallace hurts his paw and needs to rest, Millie finds a creative way to carry him around so he doesnt miss out on any of the fun.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: There are so many different kinds of butterflies and we want to meet them all! From eggs to caterpillars to cocoons to wings, Clarence and the kids learn about all things butterfly and get to make their own butterfly attracting exhibit, right in the sanctuary!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family take Goldie the Fish to Doctor Hamster for her check-up. Dr Hamster wishes she could exercise more, so Grampy Rabbit decides to build something to help.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale Of The Spectacular Sledge
programme.desc: When the rabbits discover a hoard of much needed winter vegetables in Mr McGregors garden, they must find a way to transport them - by building a spectacular new sled!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: After a tropical storm carries a little goby out to sea, the Vegimals and Kwazii set off to return him to his home atop a waterfall. The steep climb doesnt pose a problem for the goby until his predators arrive.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: At the chemist, Bluey and Bingo have fun playing with the CCTV screens.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar set up a new toy for a tiger. They then hold an amazing leaf insect and find out how this tiny creature has something in common with the tiger.

programme.desc: Australias longest running music TV show, rage is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres and eras. We curate the best clips of all time to surprise and entertain you for hours.

programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Joe OBrien.

programme.title: ABC News Day
programme.desc: As every story unfolds, catch each breaking moment and stay up to date. Ros Childs brings you the latest news, interviews, analysis and original reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world, we unpack the latest in politics, shifting national affairs and the global events shaping our lives. Guest host Melissa Clarke asks the tough questions on the big issues to the key decision makers.

programme.title: ABC News Hour
programme.desc: Stay in the know with Australias trusted news source. From your neighbourhood, across the country and around the world, ABC News bring you the days top stories and latest news, all verified. Presented by Ruby Cornish.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: A special episode of The Pacific celebrating the 50th anniversary of PNGs independence. Join us as we reflect on 50 years of nationhood - the successes, and the challenges - plus what comes next for PNG in the years ahead.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
programme.desc: Hate speech vs free speech, with journalists and media personalities such as Jimmy Kimmel losing their jobs for their comments about Charlie Kirk and Trumps threatened crackdown on NGOs. Plus mental health and UFOs.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time to stay in touch with whats happening in our world. Manny Tsigas presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: The home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the big stories from across Australia and around the globe. The ABCs network of reporters cover important stories and all the news you need. Presented by Manny Tsigas.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. Weve got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Craig Smart.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch
programme.desc: Bridget Brennan, James Glenday, Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne hear from some of the guests who have appeared on News Breakfast. Plus our film critic Zak Hepburn and resident foodie Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
programme.desc: Hate speech vs free speech, with journalists and media personalities such as Jimmy Kimmel losing their jobs for their comments about Charlie Kirk and Trumps threatened crackdown on NGOs. Plus mental health and UFOs.

programme.title: Close Of Business
programme.desc: Alicia Barry presents a weekly roundup of business, finance and economic news including the latest trends on Australian and overseas markets, analysing whats going on in the local and global economy and how it affects you.

programme.title: DW Focus On Europe
programme.desc: Mallorca is a hotspot for the prostitution business in Spain, where most women in the industry are victims of traffickers. In Britain, Gen Z is reviving singing sea shanties. Plus Sardinia is the island of centenarians.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time to stay in touch with whats happening in our world. Manny Tsigas presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: BTN High
programme.desc: We find out why people are turning to social media for health advice, and the risks and benefits of medical information being accessible on social media.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: A special episode of The Pacific celebrating the 50th anniversary of PNGs independence. Join us as we reflect on 50 years of nationhood - the successes, and the challenges - plus what comes next for PNG in the years ahead.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: The World This Week
programme.desc: Andrea Nierhoff brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: ABC News Regional
programme.desc: Take a closer look at whats making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about whats really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Not Stupid
programme.sub-title: Charlie Kirk and Trumps divided America
programme.desc: In the week following the death of right wing commentator Charlie Kirk there have been plenty of claims and conspiracy theories. Julia Baird and guest host Chas Licciardello wonder if America is now more divided than ever.

programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australias best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.
